author: Andre Maniam JC:
casenumber: General Division of the High Court — Originating Summons No 342 of 2020 (Summons No 5276 of 2020), Originating Summons No 407 of 2020 (Summons No 4725 of 2020), Originating Summons No 1151 of 2020 and Originating Summons No 1158 of 2020 (Summons No 4944 of 2020)
casename: Convexity Ltd v Phoenixfin Pte Ltd and others and other matters
counsel: Daniel Chia, Ker Yanguang, Jeanette Wong (Morgan Lewis Stamford LLC) for the applicant; K Sathinathan, J Jayanthi (Lincoln’s Law LLC) for the respondents.

headings.text: Consequential orders in respect of the Confidentiality Relief
The claimant’s application for a freezing injunction
The respondents’ applications for the orders in OS 342 and OS 407 to be set aside
